name: Butterfly Effect (TurtlesPancake)
description:
Butterfly Effect is a complete Yume Nikki fangame made in Google Slides. 

Featuring:

  • 4 Main Nexus Worlds
  • 4 Obtainable Effects
  • 2 Endings
  • Many other areas

You can also play it here in your browser!

There is a slight amount of horror content.

You will need some version of Microsoft Powerpoint in order to play the downloadable file. If you don't have Powerpoint, the browser version should work for everyone. 

Start the game by entering present mode. This can be done by either clicking F5 on your keyboard, or clicking "From Beginning" under the slideshow options menu at the top.

If you experience issues with images or audio not loading properly, enabling editing mode may help.
